title: Non-canonical NOTCH1 signaling regulates ferroptosis vulnerability in dormant lung cancer cells with stable resistance.
abstract: Non-genetic resistance of cancer remains poorly understood in clinical research and practice. To better understand resistant cancer cell heterogeneity, we isolated a novel riboflavin
